sect1.title: Build Flags
sect1.para: We will need to setup target specific flags for the compiler and linkers.
Lets add the build flags to ~/.bashrc to prevent issues if we stop and come back later.

screen.userinput: echo export BUILD32="-m32 -mcpu=ultrasparc" >> ~/.bashrc echo export BUILD64="-m64 -mcpu=ultrasparc" >> ~/.bashrc
